section.title: APB2 Peripheral Clock Enable Disable Status

indexterm.primary: APB2 Peripheral Clock Enable Disable Status

para.para: Get the enable or disable status of the APB2 peripheral clock.

section.para: Get the enable or disable status of the APB2 peripheral clock.

note.title: Note
note.para: After reset, the peripheral clock (used for registers read/write access) is disabled and the application software has to enable this clock before using it.
